name: High School Evil Teacher
description:
The story is about a High school evil teacher who is the head of the school & he loves to put students in locking up & giving physical punishment to students in the classroom in this high school games. You are a new bully boy in town & has been transferred to the High school. You are not good at studies & always try to find shortcuts by copying & stealing other student’s homework. High school is considered the worst school in the state with very creepy teachers. Madam Dolores is the evil teacher of the school & she loves to put students in detention like you. Now it is challenging for you to survive the Highschool year somehow.M ake an escape plan of high school story to sneak into the school day during late nights to change your grades & steal assignments. But the situation can become more complicated because Madam Dolores stays in school too after off-timings. Do different criminal activities with hidden objects. Use a key to enter the principal's room. Find the exam paper and copy some sensitive data. Take revenge from the Creepy Teacher. You must complete missions without getting caught in this high school game.
High School Story Starts when you decided to scare the Spooky Teacher. The evil Teacher has been frightening kids, giving them physical punishment and at times torturing kids in High School secret story. Be a scary guy super angry in cross paths. If you get caught, you are done in cross paths. Closely monitor his suspect movement, one mistake and you'll be caught in this survival game in criminal city. High school Evil teacher is a High school story game which makes you feel amazing at your campus. Its different levels require you to complete different escape missions. You will enjoy it at hell. Start the ultimate battle between scary Student and the evil teacher. The Missions of the Ultimate Student is fighting & Sneaking in Stealth Mode. High school is a Fun addictive game in which and you are going to Fight against evil teacher in classroom environment. Fight evil in escape 3d game and do not get caught in his eyes, or he will grab you and can kill you in teacher scary game. Your task is to escape and destroy his plan in High School Story survival game. You must complete mission tasks without getting caught and within allocated time in best crime stealth challenge mission.

Special Features High School Evil Teacher:
• Escape & Run away from Spooky Teacher
• Find out Secrets of High School Story
• Amazing Sounds & Voice Hovers
• Smooth, Easy & Intuitive Controls
• Interesting Game-play & Activities
• High-Quality 3D Graphics
